name: Ricetta: pizza ai funghi
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mushroom Pizza.

value.name: Fungo
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Cavolo
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Formaggio
value.desc: A base di latte fermentato. Ad alto contenuto energetico e usato in una vasta gamma di piatti.

value.name: Pizza ai funghi
value.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

value.name: Jean
value.desc: Virtuosa e rigorosa Cavaliere del Dente di leone, oltre che Gran Maestra Reggente dei Cavalieri di Favonius di Mondstadt.

value.name: Pizza rinvigorente
value.desc: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from Precious Chest at Stormterror's Lair</color>
